Papers may be removed from or placed within this File only by the Political Registry.A* EXT f ::i 945 POEIIGN OFFICE, S .W . 1., 6th December, 1945. Dpar Harrison, I am sending you herewith four copies of 'A Handbook of Diplomatic and Political Arabic”, which you may care to send to the Residency at Busnire for their own use and for distribution to Kowait, Bahrein and Muscat. irvvrl C- Iaj . P.A.K. Harrison, Esq. India Office.■ - • — , . ' ' *- Cfo^) Previous File P. POLITICAL (INTERNAL) DEPARTMENT.

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 10; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of correspondence between the Secretary to the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf and the Under Secretary of State for India regarding the distribution of the Handbook of Diplomatic & Political Arabicto the Political Residency in the Persian Gulf at Bushire, and to the Political Agencies Kowait [Kuwait], Bahrein [Bahrain], and Muscat.
